```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message='FALSE'}
source("../../../rhelpers/knitr_setup.R")
```

If R cannot find `NCStats` when you submit
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(NCStats)
```

then `NCStats` has not been properly installed on your computer.  See [this FAQ](install-NCStats.html) for directions on how to install `NCStats`.
